sense.def:
To plead with someone to do something
pomeni zelo čustveno prositi nekoga, naj nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: He was pleading with her to control herself.
Of course his mother does her best to plead his case.

sense.def:
To plead a particular thing
pomeni navesti določeno stvar kot vzrok ali opravičilo za to, da nečesa nismo naredili.

seg.quote: I pleaded that I felt ill.

sense.def:
To plead in a court of law
pomeni, da nekdo, ki je obtožen kaznivega dejanja, pred sodiščem uradno izjavi, ali se čuti krivega ali ne.
